column4: Anyone else having 8.10 refuse to preview fonts? Double-clicking on a TTF or OTF gets "no application installed for this file type"... wha?
gnome-specimen is already installed; I'm going to force a reinstall now, tho
sudo apt-get install gfontview would do you too
gfontview is no longer in repos
given that you can buy Dell machines w/ Ubuntu pre-installed, you might be a bit quick on the ot flag there...
then its a badly formed question ;)
it's all about knowing how to poke the bot :)
ive only been up an hour with no coffee yet :(
just wanna get my VMs all up and i'm there
i've been saying that, mac used to be the same
